   - A physical or electronic signature of a person ("Complaining Party") 
   authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is 
   claimed to be infringed; 
 
I am Molly Wens, AKA SweetWitch, the author and exclusive owner of all rights to the
story, The Spell of Appalachia, Chapter 1 and I am acting on my own behalf. 
 
   - Identification of the copyrighted work claimed to have been 
   infringed, or if multiple copyrighted works at a single online site are 
   covered by a single notification, a representative list of such works at 
   that site; 
 
The story in question and the reason for this email is The Spell of Appalachia,
Chapter 1, containing the following text: 
 
*(Dear Reader, 
 
This story is an adaptation of the various tales my Grandmother used to tell me
about the magic in the Smoky Mountains. I hope you enjoy it as much as I enjoyed
hearing her "give the tell", as she called it. 
 
Parts 2 and 3 will follow immediately. As always, it has been my most profound joy
bringing you this story. Please take just a moment to vote at the end. Also, I take
great pleasure in reading your comments so please feel free to tell me how you feel.
